sense.def: Alternative Names ying ji 癭疾 , goiter ailment; ying liu 癭瘤 , goiter tumor; ying zhui 癭贅 , goiter redundancy; ying qi 癭氣 , goiter qi; 癭結氣 , goiter with bound qi. Pathological Condition of a swelling at the front side of the neck to the side of the throat. Shi ming 釋名 8: 癭，嬰也，在頸嬰喉也 , “ Ying , goiter , is ying , to surround. Because at the neck it surrounds the throat”. Ying he 硬核 , hard kernel [2]

Pathological Condition of jie he 結核 , nodular kernel, appearing as a hard swelling. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 26: 主 癭瘤結氣，散頸下硬核痛 , “It controls bound qi associated with goiter tumors, and it disperses hard kernels with pain below the neck”.
